p:
W. somnifera is used in Ayurveda toward promoting health and longevity, slowing the aging process, revitalizing the body, reducing anxiety, and creating a general sense of well‐being. These traditional applications of W. somnifera are due to a wide range of pharmacological effects observed in recent preclinical studies in animals and clinical trials in humans including anxiolytic, sedative, anti‐inflammatory, analgesic, immunomodulatory, antioxidant effects, cardiopulmonary, and hypotensive effects.
